lines.gurmukhi: dIpk pqMg Ail kml sill mIn ckeI ckor miRg riv sis nwd hY
lines.transliteration_english: Deepak Patang Ali Kamal Salil Meena , Chakaee Chakor Mrig Ravi Sasi Naad Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A moth, black bee, fish, ruddy Sheldrake, (Allectoris gracea) and a deer loves flame of a lamp, lotus flower, water, Sun, moon and sound of music produced by Ghanda Herha respectively.

lines.gurmukhi: pRIiq iek AMgI bhu rMgI nhI sMgI koaU sbY duKdweI n shweI AMiq Awid hY
lines.transliteration_english: Preeti Ik Angee Bahu Rangee Nahee Sangee Kooo , Sabai Doukhadaaee N Sahaaee Anti Aadi Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: All their love being one-sided is very painful that does not help neither in the beginning nor in the end.

lines.gurmukhi: jIvq n swDsMg mUey n prmgiq igAwn iDAwn pRym rs pRIqm pRswid hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jeevat N Saadhasang Mooay N Paramagati , Giaan Dhiaan Praym Ras Preetam Prasaadi Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: These living beings of subhuman life can neither be blessed with holy congregation of true devotees nor salvation after death. They cannot even be the recipient of Guru's teachings, His contemplation and the divine nectar that the grace of True Guru can d

lines.gurmukhi: mwns jnmu pwie sRI gur dieAw inDwn crn srin suKPl ibsmwd hY ]321]
lines.transliteration_english: Maanas Janamu Paai Sree Gur Daiaa Nidhaana , Charan Sarani Soukhaphal Bisamaad Hai ?321?

Shabad OS B.translation: Coming to the refuge of the True Guru, the store-house of mercy and that too in the life of a human being and practicing on the True Guru-given Naam Simran can bless one with that unique fruit of comfort and peace. (321)
